docs.title: Donutbox
docs.text: Welcome. This is my quick-reference library for scripts, homelab notes, and handy snippets.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Quick-reference notes for Jamf Pro admin tasks, troubleshooting, and deployment patterns.

docs.title: Common tasks
docs.text:
• Device inventory & smart groups
  • Configuration profiles (Wi-Fi, VPN, certificates, restrictions)
  • Policies (installs, scripts, maintenance, login/logout)
  • Patch management
  • Enrollment (Automated Device Enrollment, user-initiated, DEP troubleshooting)

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
• Enrollment failures and “MDM profile removed” scenarios
  • Profile install conflicts and scope issues
  • Policy not running / logs / triggers
  • Extension attributes and inventory updates

docs.title: Useful pages
docs.text:
• Scripts
  • Profiles
  • Troubleshooting
  • Onboarding checklist

Tip: Keep snippets copy-paste friendly. Prefer short commands with a one-line explanation.

docs.title: Proxmox
docs.text: Notes for building, maintaining, and troubleshooting Proxmox VE clusters and VMs/CTs.

docs.title: Core topics
docs.text:
• Storage: ZFS, LVM-thin, Ceph (if used), backups, pruning
  • Networking: bridges, VLANs, firewall rules, SDN
  • Virtualization: VM vs LXC, virtio, CPU types, PCIe passthrough
  • Backups: Proxmox Backup Server, schedules, retention, restores

docs.title: Common workflows
docs.text:
• Create a VM template (cloud-init)
  • Add VLAN-aware bridges
  • GPU/iGPU passthrough checks (IOMMU, vfio, ROMs)
  • Snapshot + rollback before upgrades

docs.title: Useful pages
docs.text:
• Build checklist
  • Networking
  • Storage & ZFS
  • Passthrough
  • Backups

Tip: Include exact commands + the expected output (or “what good looks like”).
